feature.label: M2eclipse Natives Integration Feature
feature.description: Extension for m2e to handle native dependencies in maven projects WARNING: This version is only for Eclipse m2e 1.0+ if you are using m2eclipse from sonatype version 0.12.* uncheck the "Show only the latest versions of available software" option from the eclipse install screen and install the 0.0.1 version of this plugin.
